english_example_sentence: If my friend feels bad, he immediately returns home.
russian_example_sentence: Если мой друг почувствует себя плохо, он немедленно вернётся домой.
turkish_example_sentence: Arkadaşım kendini kötü hissetse, hemen eve döner.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Arkadaşım kendini kötü ______, hemen eve döner.
